text:
<@UHDQQ4GN6> I am starting to catch up on all the PR s made over Christmas.
Can you remind me where we are on being able to release ChainRulesTestUtils v0.6?
And on being able to use it in ChainRules.jl?
I know it is about inferability of rules, I just have lost track of what PRs are made and what remain

elements.text:
I am starting to catch up on all the PR s made over Christmas.
Can you remind me where we are on being able to release ChainRulesTestUtils v0.6?
And on being able to use it in ChainRules.jl?
I know it is about inferability of rules, I just have lost track of what PRs are made and what remain

text: v0.6 was held back so some non-breaking PR's could be merged first (<https://github.com/JuliaDiff/ChainRulesTestUtils.jl/pull/78#issuecomment-745430598>). Those PRs have been merged. Otherwise it's ready to be registered. The resolvable type-instabilities in CR have already been fixed (unless some were introduced in recent PRs), so all that will be needed on the CR side is to specify for type-unstable rules to not check for type-instability.

). Those PRs have been merged. Otherwise it's ready to be registered. The resolvable type-instabilities in CR have already been fixed (unless some were introduced in recent PRs), so all that will be needed on the CR side is to specify for type-unstable rules to not check for type-instability.
